有効期間と自動更新について
Get Feh Pass

Regarding Cancellation:
・ If you cancel your Feh Pass subscription,
you will still be able to access all the benefits
of a Feh Pass until they refresh.
・ You will lose access to these benefits once
your Feh Pass subscription has expired.
・ If you do not cancel automatic renewal at
least 24 hours before your subscription is set
to refresh, your Feh Pass subscription will
be automatically renewed.
・ See the FAQ for more information on how
to check the validity period of your Feh Pass
subscription or to cancel automatic renewal.

・ Your Feh Pass subscription will be renewed
automatically each month, refreshing your Feh
Pass subscription benefits, unless you cancel it
at least 24 hours before your subscription is
set to renew.
・ If you change to a new device that has a
different OS than your current device, your
subscription cannot be transferred. Please
cancel your previous subscription before
starting a subscription on the new device.
・ You can collect Resplendent Heroes by
logging in during their distribution period.
・ If you subscribe to Feh Pass near the end
of a Resplendent Hero's distribution period,
please ensure there is enough time in their
distribution period for you to collect them.

Release
Version

$aAll Heroes released in Ver. $a0.X will be
available as additional Bonus Heroes.

Vault of Heaven at Season's End:
・ Tier 37 or lower → Tier 23
・ Tier 38 or higher → Tier 31

Rules in the Vault of Heaven:
・ All Allies Survive Bonus
    If you win with all allies alive,
    you will get +10 to your Lift.

Aether Raids - Chaos Season:
The trickster Loki has created
a special season of Aether Raids
for her mysterious purposes.

During the Chaos season, special
Lift values and rules apply that
are unique to this season.

Chaos Season Bonus Heroes:
Every Chaos season, all Heroes
released in a select version update
of the game will be available as
additional Bonus Heroes. Only
normal Bonus Mythic Heroes will
lower Lift loss on failed defense,
but that is the only difference.

Lift Bonuses in Chaos Seasons:
・ All raiding parties get +70 Lift
gained, and those with a Bonus
Ally who defeated one or more
foes receive a bonus of +20.

・ All defensive teams get 40 to
mitigation of Lift loss.

Disabled Effects in Chaos Season:
These seasonal Legendary and
Mythic effects will be disabled
during Chaos season:
・ Effects that boost ally's stats
・ Effects that change Lift gain or
Lift loss via Blessings or Merges
・ Special slots

Team Creation in Chaos Season:
・ Duplicate Heroes are not
allowed on teams.
・ You can include only one ally
that can use Sing or Dance
on your team.
・ You can include only one ally
that can use Savior.

Standard Lift Bonuses:
・ Putting a bonus character in
your raiding party will give you a
+20 bonus to Lift.
・ In the Vault of Heaven, raids
with no losses will give you +10.
・ Using a bonus Mythic Hero will
mitigate Lift lost.

Chaos Season Bonus Heroes:
Every Chaos season, all Heroes
released in a select version update
of the game will be available as
additional Bonus Heroes. Only
normal Bonus Mythic Heroes will
lower Lift loss on failed defense,
but that is the only difference.

Seasonal Parties 1:
You will have the option to set
raiding parties that will change
with the seasons, with the active
party displayed during its season.
Note: This option will become
available after you complete the
Aether Raids tutorial.

Due to Chaos season restrictions,
level 40 Alfonse, Sharena, and
Anna will defend in place of
other units.
Disabled

Settings:
You can turn on Merge Heroes
w/Lower ★ Rating to be able to
merge Heroes who are a lower
★ rating than the target ally.
Merging this way will grant SP
but will not increase stat values.

Aether Raids - Chaos Season:
During Chaos seasons, rules and Lift values
that are unique to the season will be in effect.
